ovdesc.p: This table will provide the user with the facility of translating into the various languages defined on the LANGUAGE table:
1) All the field names (prompts) of each Application (including internal fields) and
2) General T24 System messages as detailed later on under the ID 'GLOBAL TEXT'.

For each language existing on the LANGUAGE table, the user will have the facility to enter the applicable translations. It must be noted immediately that, for performance reasons, the English translation of field names (see 1 above) will be ignored by the System.
English translation of 'GLOBAL TEXT' messages, on the contrary, will be recognised.

The English names of the fields will be taken directly from the program. Translation of field names in other languages will be recognised and used in accordance with the language code defined in the corresponding user profile.

desc.p: Identifies the second language text field which allows the user to enter the translation text in the language specified in the 3 dots preceding the literal 'TEXT' (...TEXT).
1) When the ID is an existing Application name:
- Each text field where the user has started to enter translations must be expanded up to the exact number of fields of the corresponding application.
- The Text which can be input will be limited to 18 characters for a single value field, 15 characters for a multivalue field and 12 characters for a subvalue field.
- The text for a multivalue field must start with 'XX.' followed by the translation desired by the user.

- When there is an association of fields, instead of the dot, the '<' sign must be indicated after the first field of the association, the '>' after the last field of the association, the '-' sign on any field in the middle of the association.
Example (from the customer file)
a) Association
7.1 Relation code XX< translation text 8.1 Relat. customer XX- translation text 9.1 Rev.Relat code XX> translation text
b) Single Multivalue
12.1 Other Acct OfficerXX. translation text
- Association of subvalue fields will follow the same logic but the indication will now be done by 4 'X' ie. XX.XX with the applicable addition of the signs '.', '<', '-', or '>'.
Example
a) Assocation (from the Agency file)

10.1 Autoroute ccy XX< translation text 11.1.1 Autoroute ApplXX-XX< translation text 12.1.1 Autoroute bankXX-XX- translation text 13.1.1 Autoroute RGN XX-XX- translation text 14.1.1 Autoroute ACCTXX>XX> translation text
b) Single Subvalue (from the FT.CHARGE.TYPE table).
9.1 Zone XX< translation text 10.1.1 Country XX-XX. translation text

- Each expansion of a text field will correspond to the next field of the corresponding application. At the same time, the original text (from the program) will be displayed on the right hand side of the screen.
- Once the user has started to define some field names in one language, he will be forced to at least complete the translation of all the fields in this language.
- Translation is only allowed for languages existing on the LANGUAGE TABLE. 2. When the ID is equal to 'GLOBAL.TEXT':
- The system will allow to translate the following 55 general messages:

- Awaiting Application - Awaiting Function - Awaiting ID - Awaiting Page Instructions - Override - Continue - Select Application - Please Rekey - Awaiting Validation - First Author - Authorised - Validated - Deleted - Reversed - History Restore - Hold Status - Error Status - Printed - Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec - TMB - User - Ter - Page - Action - Authorise - Copy - Delete - Exception - History Restore - Input - List - Print - Reverse - See - Verify - Ref - CR - DR - Funct. - Function - A2CDEHILPRSV - Verified - FCY - LCY - Please enter your sign on name - Fast.Input - Q-Auditor.Review - Auditor Reviewed - Background.Valid - G1 - Updating files - Txn complete - Txn cancelled - OV.Approval. - Trade.Input - F1 F2 F3 F4 F5 F6 - Y NO
- In this case, the English translation (Text 1) will not be ignored.
- When a value is changed, the previous value will be displayed on the right hand side of the screen.
- Translation text can go up to 47 characters.
- Translation is only allowed for languages existing on the LANGUAGE table.
